titles.title: A joint resolution designating the period from August 1 through 2, 1987, as "National Twins Days".

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 7/29/1987--Introduced. Designates the period from August 1 through August 2, 1987, as National Twins Days.
